item.description: Moohoo everyone! We’ve released an impromptu update that documents a little better the API and brings a new version of ClamAV (0.105.1). Note: The update to ClamAV 0.105.1 is recommended by ClamAV as a security update (See ClamAV Update article) Once again summarized what changes: The schema of the domain section of the API has been adjusted and improved. Automatic GitHub actions for building the latest container versions has been set up (currently not used productively).
